metadata.title: CVE-2019-9897 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Multiple denial-of-service attacks that can be triggered by writing to theterminal exist in PuTTY versions before 0.71.

criterions.comment: putty: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
